channel.title: Emote tab\banking
channel.description: Hello, I'm Trying to open my bank from the emote tab. I've already got the ::bank command added. And i already got the name added in emote tab. i just need it to open bank when i click bank lol Any help? ;D

item.title: Emote tab\banking
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:12, topic:426792”]Here’s what It’s going to look like:

case ##:
openUpBank();
break;

You’ll place it in your ActionButtons Class since you’re using DeltaScape.[/quote]
then it’s prob clickingMost

Read full topic

item.title: Emote tab\banking
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Here’s what It’s going to look like:

case ##:
openUpBank();
break;

You’ll place it in your ActionButtons Class since you’re using DeltaScape.

Read full topic

item.title: Emote tab\banking
item.dc:creator: @R3minice R3minice
item.description:
@R3minice wrote:

Edit your action button packet so that it sends you a message or prints in the cmd the id of the button.
So something like
if (c.playerRights > 2) {
//stuff here
}
then in in your actionbutton handler / clickingmost or w.e you add the id in the switch statement and in it call the bank method, I think it’s called openUpBank();

Read full topic

item.title: Emote tab\banking
item.dc:creator: @sweetname sweetname
item.description:
@sweetname wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:9, topic:426792”][quote author=sweetname link=topic=529491.msg3864207#msg3864207 date=1324864178]

Find the ID of the button you’re clicking, and add your Bank method under the packet. Post which emote you’re trying to do and I’ll do it for you. Which source are you using?

Where do i find bank method?

You can find it under object click methods. Which source are you using?

A blank delta source & i don’t have object click message in my source lol

You didn’t tell us which emote you’re trying to add it for.

There’s no emote to it.
I want it like this http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fVm79s-wO8w&feature=related
Skip to 0:46
[/quote]

I’ll say it this way. The emote button you’re trying to add it for is? What does it say on the button, or what did it say before you edited the text?[/quote]
It says 168.

Read full topic
